meanings.definition: A mass of lymphoid tissue located at the back of the nasal cavity.
meanings.sent1: The adenoids help fight infections in the nose.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended removing the adenoids to improve breathing.
meanings.sent3: The adenoids decided to throw a party in the nasal cavity.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like adenoids in the nasal cavity.
meanings.sent5: The adenoids stood guard at the entrance of the nasal cavity.

meanings.definition: The inflammation or enlargement of the adenoids.
meanings.sent1: His adenoids were swollen, causing difficulty in breathing.
meanings.sent2: The adenoids' inflammation was evident during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The adenoids threw a tantrum, causing a nasal cavity riot.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was like inflamed adenoids in a nasal cavity.
meanings.sent5: The doctor prescribed medication to reduce the swelling of the adenoids.
